effect.x_y: Protects all friendly Pokémon from damaging moves. Only works on the first turn after the user is sent out.
effect.omega_ruby_alpha_sapphire: Protects all friendly Pokémon from damaging moves. Only works on the first turn after the user is sent out.

short_effect.x_y: Protects all friendly Pokémon from damaging moves. Only works on the first turn after the user is sent out.
short_effect.omega_ruby_alpha_sapphire: Protects all friendly Pokémon from damaging moves. Only works on the first turn after the user is sent out.

flavor_text.x_y: Using a pulled-up mat as a shield, the user protects itself and its allies from damaging moves. This does not stop status moves.
flavor_text.omega_ruby_alpha_sapphire: Using a pulled-up mat as a shield, the user protects itself and its allies from damaging moves. This does not stop status moves.
